text: Dušan Vlahović (; born 28 January 2000) is a Serbian professional footballer. He plays as a striker for Italian club Juventus. In 2020, he joined the Serbia national football team. Vlahović tested positive for COVID-19 in March 2020. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Belgrade Category:Association football forwards Category:2022 FIFA World Cup players
title: Dušan Vlahović
